item.title: HackTheBox - Guard Writeup
item.description: Enumeration Top 1000 ports scan nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap/initial 10.10.10.50 the result scan all ports nmap -sC -sV -p- -oN nmap/all_ports 10.10.10.50 the result Open Ports Well, both nmap scan result shows SSH port just open Foothold/Gaining Access SSH Let’s try SSH into the machine using the private key we’ve got from the previous box [Markup] It works rBash Well, I’m login as daniel and I found the user flag already.
